tool_description:
Unofficial MotoGP data API.

At the moment the API has the following information about all categories of the MotoGP motorcycle world championship:
- The grand prix winners.
- Total number of fastest laps a rider has done, by name and country.
- Total number of podiums a rider has done, by name and country.
- Total number of poles a rider has done, by name and country.
- The riders who have become world champions.
title: MotoGP Data API

api_list.name: Search Champions
api_list.description: Find Champions by season, rider, country, constructor and/or class.

api_list.name: Get one Champion
api_list.description: Gets a specific Champion by ID.

api_list.name: Get all Champions
api_list.description: Gets hundreds of results about the riders who have become world champions.

api_list.name: Search Poles
api_list.description: Find Poles by rider and/or country.

api_list.name: Get one Pole
api_list.description: Gets a specific Pole by ID.

api_list.name: Get all Poles
api_list.description: Gets hundreds of results about the total number of poles a rider has completed.

api_list.name: Search Podiums
api_list.description: Find Podiums by rider and/or country.

api_list.name: Get one Podium
api_list.description: Gets a specific Podium by ID.

api_list.name: Get all Podiums
api_list.description: Gets hundreds of results about the total number of podiums a rider has completed.

api_list.name: Search Fastest Laps
api_list.description: Find Fastest Laps by rider and/or country.

api_list.name: Get one Fastest Lap
api_list.description: Gets a specific Fastest Lap by ID.

api_list.name: Get all Fastest Laps
api_list.description: Gets hundreds of results about the total number of fastest laps a rider has completed.

api_list.name: Search Grand Prix Race Winners
api_list.description: Find Grand Prix race winners by rider, circuit, class, constructor, country or season.

api_list.name: Get one Grand Prix Race Winner
api_list.description: Gets a specific Grand Prix race winner by ID.

api_list.name: Get all Grand Prix Race Winners
api_list.description: Gets hundreds of Grand Prix race winners.
